verse: स्मर्तव्यः सततं विष्णुर्विस्मर्तव्यो न जातु चित् । सर्वे विधिनिषेधाः स्युरेतयोरेव किंकराः ॥

terms.विष्णुः: (viṣṇuḥ) - Vishnu (a Hindu deity associated with preservation and protection)

meaning: Meaning:Vishnu should be constantly remembered, and never forgotten. All the prohibitions and rules/regulations become servants of these two (constantly remembering Vishnu and not forgetting him).
